description: ultra 2 is a great professional watch with a durable build and smooth options. It has amazing battery life, especially in low power mode, and the flashlight feature is very handy. The screen can get very dark, making it difficult to read, but this watch is otherwise great for workouts and swimming.
Use_cases: -The product is durable and professional-The screen dimming feature can be improved-The product works well for workouts and has a flashlight feature
